abu-ghraib.name: Jake Bassage
abu-ghraib.quote: The photos and testaments left behind a lingering cloud of shame and sadness

abu-ghraib.name: Eileen Figueroa
abu-ghraib.quote: I assumed it was some sort of image relating to cults and Satanism due to images I have seen in horror movies

abu-ghraib.name: Elizabeth Sidoti
abu-ghraib.quote: [This] show[ed] a negative side towards the military, that might effect only a small number of soldiers

abu-ghraib.name: Jamie Rodriguez
abu-ghraib.quote: [This highlights] the terrifying images shown of Abu Ghraib, [and] the depth of inhumanity shown by both some individuals and governments

abu-ghraib.name: Collin Ma
abu-ghraib.quote: These images open up a lot about military culture and its obsession with domination

kosovar-albanians.name: Paul Moat
kosovar-albanians.quote: That was not two countries fighting for power. Instead, it was a systematic slaughter of a group of citizens in a nation

kosovar-albanians.name: Nick Ronan
kosovar-albanians.quote: This image does a great job at capturing the atrocity that occurred while only viewing such a small part of it by showing the aftermath of the violence these people suffered from

kosovar-albanians.name: Hasnain Akhtar
kosovar-albanians.quote: They are both in shock, with an emotional overflow of this emptiness that they show

kosovar-albanians.name: Aaron Gomez
kosovar-albanians.quote: Civilians are increasingly the targets in wars and conflicts

kosovar-albanians.name: River Marks
kosovar-albanians.quote: This highlights the awful death and despair of citizens in any given war conflict

napalm-girl.name: Jamie Rodriguez
napalm-girl.quote: I was stunned seeing the image of Kim Phuc running naked away from a cloud of terror behind her

napalm-girl.name: Akhil Sondhi
napalm-girl.quote: I felt that it was some kind of illusion that she appeared naked and was shocked on closer inspection to find that this actually was the case

napalm-girl.name: Jacob Fraser
napalm-girl.quote: My first initial thought was imagining some creature almost out of a horror story

napalm-girl.name: Sophia Lynch
napalm-girl.quote: There are so many things going on in the photograph, and itâ€™s difficult to even express what is perhaps the most jarring out of all of those options

napalm-girl.name: Adrianna Wellin
napalm-girl.quote: Everytime I look at this photo I feel some of the pain those children were experiencing at that moment

simon-schama-picasso.name: Fares Al-Faouri
simon-schama-picasso.quote: Gurenica is more than a painting that tells the story of the unspeakable horrors that occurred on 1937, it is an account of violence, in an abstract sense

simon-schama-picasso.name: Kevin Lin
simon-schama-picasso.quote: These scenes invoke the feeling of pain and disgust at what brought the subject in the painting to their current state

simon-schama-picasso.name: Nick Ronan
simon-schama-picasso.quote: Consider Guernica as a symbol of terror

simon-schama-picasso.name: Elizabeth Sidoti
simon-schama-picasso.quote: [What stood out most was] one light bulb...If it is a light then...this image is to illuminate...the state of terror, especially after the bombing of Guernica

simon-schama-picasso.name: Matthew Wagner
simon-schama-picasso.quote: The emotional response emanating from a painting such as Guernica can move people to take action or at least greater interest in events that may take place far away in the world

two-bangladeshi-boys.name: Spencer Kohrt
two-bangladeshi-boys.quote: The Bangladeshi boys depict a silent moment of sober reflection after the remnants of tragedy

two-bangladeshi-boys.name: Chris Gargone
two-bangladeshi-boys.quote: The image depicts the aftermath of war and how it affects the everyday lives of the citizens

two-bangladeshi-boys.name: Collin Ma
two-bangladeshi-boys.quote: These children were robbed of their childhood and thrown into a terrorizing situation beyond their control, which will impact their lives forever

two-bangladeshi-boys.name: Elizabeth Sidoti
two-bangladeshi-boys.quote: And even if they are luck enough to get through the warfare they still have to worry about the poverty

two-bangladeshi-boys.name: Jake Bassage
two-bangladeshi-boys.quote: shed incredible light...on an entire war, with suspected millions of casualties and associated atrocities
